title: Blue Essence doesn't renew
body:
Hey, 

This is Kang Lin. I have a trouble with my Blue Essence. Its been 2 weeks maybe, my blue essence doesn’t add even I got my first win of day. It doesn’t renew.
 Can you help me with it? My email is J83120717@gmail.com and my usename is Judekang.

replies.body: What exactly do you mean your BE isn't renewing? The main way you get BE is by disenchanting skin shards.
